track.name: Shiver
comments: Why can people not just fucking enjoy Coldplay's older music without comparing it to their newer stuff and complaining endlessly
this was good. and still is. such a shame listening to their crap they are doing now.. [3]
and I'll always be waiting for you...
their best, before they got really boring
Good memories comes back with this song :)
this song is sweeeeet. sort of forgot of it...

"oh gosh, how much I miss this Coldplay before "Viva La Vida" era..."
Yeah I get the point when fans say things as that, but c'mon, Viva La Vida is an awesome album, I mean, just listen to Violet Hill, Cemeteries of London, Lost, Viva La Vida. Great songs. Even MX is good... (not that good but okay haha, I love some songs from this album too)
